Title: Relates to certain requirements for new tobacco business locations
Summary: Prohibits retail dealers from opening a tobacco business within 500 feet of an already existing licensed tobacco business; provides an exception if it is determined to be in the public interest by the municipality or community board.
LawCode: Add ยง396-aaaa, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to certain requirements for new tobacco business locations
